Contact Us

Thank you for your message. We will respond as soon as we can.

You are also welcome to explore our other ways to connect.

We invite you to join our community:

  • Join our Facebook Group.
  • Join the conversation on Twitter.
  • Chat with us on freenode IRC channel #mayone.
  • Share your involvement.
  • Volunteer to help.
  • Check out our volunteer wiki.
  • If you have a technical bent, you can look at our developer wiki page.

Direct Contributions

Direct donations are collected via Democracy.com. Direct contributions, unlike pledges, are not contingent upon reaching our goals and are collected immediately.

PLEDGE NOW
PROGRESS TO NEXT CHECKPOINT

Sign-Up to our Mailing List

 

Donation by Check

Make checks payable to: Mayday PAC

MAYDAY PAC
P.O. Box 380444
Cambridge, MA 02238

You are required to send your name, address, occupation, and employer along with your check in order for us to legally accept your donation.

Embed This Widget

Use this code to embed this widget on your blog or website:
